ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: And in actual fact this just adds more time to the equation. Instead of going to the plane, killing mobs and lottoing for the occasional nice item, you now
ygData.messageBody:
And in actual fact this just adds more time to the equation. Instead of
going to the plane, killing mobs and lottoing for the occasional nice
item, you now have to get 2 or 3 objects, probably via lotto of all the
people who could use it, then turn those in for one nice item. And hope
they've debugged the quests, which I hear are incredibly buggy.

On Mon, Jan 24/00, Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Heh you realize the quests in planes are no diffrent? It's more tedious
> actually. The same mobs you hunt drop the quest components you turn them in
> and get a item. Besides which more then half of them are broken.
>
> >From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> >
> >> Its really frustrating hearing about all the new quests on the plane
> >> of sky when quests are my favorite part of the game. Lame as many of
> them
> >> are they are still more fun than camping.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
